====== Index Median Template ======



===== About =====
''index median'' is a mix of the [[docs:theme:template:index|index]] and [[docs:theme:template:median|median]] templates that:
  * does not have any sidebar
  * shows its content centered in the middle.


{{:docs:theme:element:layout_element.svg?0x250|}}

===== Usage =====

You would use it to delete the [[:docs:theme:element:page-side|sidebar]].

===== Elements =====
This template supports the following elements:
  * [[:docs:theme:element:page-header|page header]]
  * [[:docs:theme:element:page-footer|fat footer]]
